Html: What are the DLLs used for? There are 4 two-lettered folders in the ZIP file.

How can I add new localization?

I downloaded the source code and found that each of the localizations is defined in Resources.**.resx files inside "My Project" folder,

but can't find a way to open those resources files from the solution.

Opening My Project - Resources only shows the English strings.

 

Can you guide me on how to add new resources and build those dlls.

And also probably on how to submit new localizations to this project.

 

Regards,

Lestarioc
